WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Thanks for reporting this is a duplicate of:

https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/1186
WorkItem.Description:
tsc 0.9 seems to can't handle files containing language-specific chars (e.g. German umlauts in a string).

For example when I have a file1.ts with the content

```
var str = "Test german umlauts äöü";
```
the compiler says:
> Could not find file: 'C:\path\to\file1.ts'.


When the umlauts are omitted everything works as expected.
